|{{HistoryLine|||dev=Beta 1.9 Prerelease 3|Cauldron items can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 118.}}

|{{HistoryLine||1.7.2|dev=13w37a|The direct item form of cauldrons has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.}}
